label: AI Gesture Control Python
title: AI Camera-Based Gesture Response System in Python
description: Accomplished responsive gesture-controlled actuation on a Raspberry Pi AI camera, as measured by reliable physical component activation, by training and deploying customized machine learning models for real-time gesture detection in Python.
technologies: Python, PyTorch, COCO (KeyPoints) dataset, Raspberry Pi AI Camera

label: Campus Events Planner Application
title: Campus Events Planner Web Application in JavaScript
description: Developed a functional web application for discovering and organizing campus events with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and integrating a storage system for event tracking, as measured by consistent user engagement and successful event sign-ups during user testing.

label: Interactive Robotic Figure in C/C++
title: Interactive Robotic Figure in C/C++
description: Accomplished real-time voice-controlled motor actuation to simulate lifelike robotic mouth movements via optimized audio processing on a Raspberry Pi in C, as validated by precise synchronization between audio input and servo motion.
technologies: C, C++, Raspberry Pi, Arduino, Servo Motors

label: TEA @ UCSD Site
title: Themed Entertainment Association at UCSD Website
description: Developed and maintained the Themed Entertainment Association at UCSD’s website using Tailwind CSS, significantly boosting the club’s digital presence and increasing online engagement and visibility.
technologies: Tailwind CSS, HTML, JavaScript, Github Actions

label: Grade Prediction AI Model
title: Grade Prediction AI Model
description: A PyTorch-based machine learning model that predicts a student's final letter grade in a target course using their past academic performance and public course data.

label: Multithreaded File Compressor in C++
title: Multithreaded File Compressor in C++
description: Multithreaded application for high speed file compression
